channel.title: http on Codeklutz
channel.description: Recent content in http on Codeklutz

item.title: Today I learnt:422 HTTP Error code
item.description: Today while testing a soap API at work, I came across this HTTP error code called HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity . According to MDN Web docs, it means the following : The HyperText Transfer Protocol (HTTP) 422 Unprocessable Entity response status code indicates that the server understands the content type of the request entity, and the syntax of the request entity is correct, but it was unable to process the contained instructions.
